name: Five Minutes To Mine
description:
Five Minutes To Mine

A created a small mining game where the player has five minutes to mine different ores in a procedurally generated cave and collect as many points as possible to get on the highscore list. In each run a new cave is generated. At the starting point you will find a drone that follows the player and where you can buy upgrades and tools for mining. These speed up the mining of the ores and allow you to reach higher levels of the cave, where you can find rarer ores.

This is my first game created with Unity DOTS.
